title: Visual Bug when you are being CC'ed
body: Whenever I'm CC'ed by **ANY SORT**, my champion model visually lags and looks like I'm able to move but actually cannot. It's really annoying since you think you have dodged the CC, in fact,  you have been hit and you character just lags on the spot.

replies.body: Oh wow is it? Rightio thank you!

Likely, but there are other things that could cause such issues, which is why I recommended a client repair as well. If none of that helps support can walk you through a more detailed troubleshooting process. They know way more about this stuff than I do :P

That sounds more like something akin to packet loss (a connection issue) than a visual bug. You can have packet loss without high ping otherwise, so it's possible if your connection to the game servers are only just coping this could be the result since more things going on = more packets that have to make it through.

At any rate, my first recommendations are to run a client repair and to switch to an ethernet connection (if at all possible) and see if either resolves the issue.

Past that, follow through any solutions in this guide that you haven't yet: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

And failing that, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
